display: Fetal Monosomy X risk [Interpretation] based on Plasma cell-free DNA by Dosage of chromosome-specific cfDNA Qualitative

property.valueString: The ordinal risk interpretation (e.g. high risk/low risk or high probability/low probability) of the fetus having monosomy X aneuploidy based on dosage of chromosome specific cell-free DNA (cf DNA) in maternal plasma that contains both fetal and maternal DNA. Results may also be based on the mother's current age, IVF status (self, non-self, or not applicable), and gestational age. This code is based, but not limited in use to, the submitter's test, the Harmony Prenatal Test, a non-invasive prenatal test for screening of fetal aneuploidy.
Fet Ms X risk Plas.cfDNA Ql
